text:
@GavinNewsom I agree. Good morning, Governor Gavin Newsome. To flatten a curve needs participants to wear PPE or Personal Protective Equipment to assist this desired result, a flatter curve on infected Coronavirus Californians. Have a pleasant Wednesday morning, Governor! A supporter.

7/8/20
